subSections.title: Kanji
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanji|grade=|rs=黍03}}

# [[black]], [[bluish]] black
# [[gloomy]], [[dusky]]
# used to indicate the [[w:Li people|Li]] people of [[Hainan]] Province, China

|goon=らい
|kanon=れい
|on=り
|kun=くろ-, くろ-い
|nanori=たみ
